content.en: Dark matter analysis: Scientists are using algorithms to answer important questions about dark matter halos. They are measuring the evolution of the mass function of dark matter halos, studying the clustering of halos, and investigating the relationship between different mass definitions. Algorithms are also being developed to identify and characterize substructure within dark matter halos. These findings are helping scientists understand the properties and behavior of dark matter in our universe.
content.da: Mørk stof analyse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare vigtige spørgsmål om mørk stof-haloer. De måler udviklingen af massefunktionen for mørk stof-haloer, studerer haloernes klyngedannelse og undersøger forholdet mellem forskellige massedefinitioner. Algoritmer udvikles også til at identificere og karakterisere understrukturer inden for mørk stof-haloer. Disse fund hjælper forskere med at forstå egenskaberne og adfærden af mørk stof i vores univers.
